summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Ninth Avenue, in the City of Seattle, from Union Street to Pine Street, by constructing concrete sidewalks or wooden sidewalks thereon where necessary, in accordance with Resolution No. 2281 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
